title: Lynda - Creating a Poster with Adobe Mobile Apps
description:
Lynda - Creating a Poster with Adobe Mobile Apps

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 36m Beginner Nov 18, 2015 Updated Feb 05, 2016 | Uploaded in Feb 13, 2016 by 2boweb
 
Subject: Design 
Software: Illustrator InDesign Photoshop Adobe Mobile Apps 
Author: Tony Harmer
 
Adobe mobile apps enable designers and artists to take their sketching and ideation workflows on the goâ€”anywhere they can bring a smartphone or tablet. In this course, author Tony Harmer introduces the Capture CC and Comp CC apps, as he pulls together the various parts of a poster design. He shows how to define colors, draw shapes, and lay out the poster, as well as create brushes for use in Photoshop and Illustrator. By following along, members will come to understand the power of the apps and how the toolset can play an important role in their creative process. Tony finishes by taking the project into the major Creative Cloud players: Illustrator, InDesign, and Photoshop.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Drawing and defining the basics shapes in Capture CC
	â€¢	Developing a color palette with Capture CC
	â€¢	Creating brushes to paint with Capture CC
	â€¢	Laying out the poster in Comp CC
	â€¢	Fine-tuning the poster in Illustrator, InDesign, and Photoshop
